data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Bilaspur prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Bilaspur you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 382,000 souls living in the county of Bilaspur with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Leper people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Bilaspur.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 373,163 who are far from you in Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
